_comment.READ_ME: Edit the data fields in this file, then remove the _comment field.  Remember to save as data.json in the directory you made for you rat.
_comment.READ_ME_2: Rarity is increasing and its range is 0-3 inclusive.
_comment.READ_ME_3: Health, attack, and defense cannot go below 1 or above 10
_comment.READ_ME_4: Store this file saved as data.json in the same directory as image.png
